keyMoments.title: Buggy Saves His Crew
keyMoments.description: Buggy arrives with Alvida to rescue his crew from the cannibalistic Kumate Tribe, demonstrating his value as their captain.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Buggy's leadership and the loyalty between him and his crew members.
keyMoments.quote: Did you really think I'd die that easily?!

keyMoments.title: Defeat of Kumate Tribe
keyMoments.description: Buggy fights alongside Alvida, Mohji, and Cabaji to defeat the Kumate Tribe.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Buggy's combat abilities and his partnership with Alvida.

keyMoments.title: Buggy Reunites with His Crew
keyMoments.description: Buggy is fully reunited with his crew after rescuing them, with his body completely reassembled.
keyMoments.significance: Completes Buggy's recovery arc from his defeat at Orange Town.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Sets Sail for Revenge
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Alvida set sail together to pursue and defeat Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Buggy-Alvida Alliance as an ongoing threat to the Straw Hats.

relationships.description: Buggy and Alvida have formed an alliance to pursue and defeat Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Buggy and Alvida work together to rescue the Buggy Pirates and defeat the Kumate Tribe.

relationships.description: Mohji is one of Buggy's subordinates in the Buggy Pirates.
Cabaji is one of Buggy's subordinates in the Buggy Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Alvida Helps Rescue Buggy Pirates
keyMoments.description: Alvida arrives with Buggy to rescue his crew from the Kumate Tribe.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strength of the Buggy-Alvida alliance and Alvida's combat prowess.

keyMoments.title: Fights Kumate Tribe
keyMoments.description: Alvida uses her Smooth-Smooth Fruit powers to help defeat the Kumate Tribe.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Alvida's new slender form and devil fruit abilities make her a formidable fighter.

relationships.description: Alvida and Buggy have formed an alliance to pursue and defeat Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Alvida and Buggy work together to rescue the Buggy Pirates and defeat the Kumate Tribe, solidifying their alliance.

keyMoments.title: Mourns Captain Buggy
keyMoments.description: Mohji participates in the funeral ceremony for Buggy, whom the crew believes to be dead.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Mohji's loyalty to his captain despite their often contentious relationship.

keyMoments.title: Fights Cabaji for Captaincy
keyMoments.description: Mohji argues with Cabaji about who should become the new captain of the Buggy Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Mohji's ambition and desire for leadership.
keyMoments.quote: I should be the next captain!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Richie
keyMoments.description: Mohji is accidentally defeated by Richie while the lion is sleepwalking.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic moment that shows Mohji's lack of true leadership potential.

relationships.description: Mohji and Cabaji compete for status within the Buggy Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Mohji and Cabaji fight over who should become the next captain after Buggy's presumed death.

keyMoments.title: Mourns Captain Buggy
keyMoments.description: Cabaji participates in the funeral ceremony for Buggy, whom the crew believes to be dead.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Cabaji's loyalty to his captain.

keyMoments.title: Fights Mohji for Captaincy
keyMoments.description: Cabaji argues with Mohji about who should become the new captain of the Buggy Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Cabaji's ambition and desire for leadership.
keyMoments.quote: No, I am more worthy to lead!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Richie
keyMoments.description: Cabaji is accidentally defeated by Richie while the lion is sleepwalking.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic moment that shows Cabaji's lack of true leadership potential.

relationships.description: Cabaji and Mohji compete for status within the Buggy Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Cabaji and Mohji fight over who should become the next captain after Buggy's presumed death.

keyMoments.title: Becomes Captain While Sleepwalking
keyMoments.description: Richie accidentally defeats both Mohji and Cabaji while sleepwalking, leading the crew to crown him as their new captain.
keyMoments.significance: A comedic moment that highlights the absurdity of the Buggy Pirates' leadership struggle. The crew temporarily becomes known as the 'Richie Pirates.'

relationships.description: Richie is Mohji's beast companion and fighting partner.
